content.raw: This updates the docker directory to have both a shell Dockerfile and a Dockerfile that will run simulation. The `subt_shell` Dockerfile supports an interactive terminal, suitable for development and testing. The `subt_sim_entry` has an entry point script that will run `ign launch`.
content.html: This updates the docker directory to have both a shell Dockerfile and a Dockerfile that will run simulation. The subt_shell Dockerfile supports an interactive terminal, suitable for development and testing. The subt_sim_entry has an entry point script that will run ign launch.
